title: Edinburgh/Old Town
name: Anatomical Museum
address: University of Edinburgh, Doorway 3, Medical School, Teviot Place
hours: Open on the last Saturday of each month between 10.00am â€“ 4pm (last admission 3.30pm). Closed June/July and December
content: The Skeleton of William Burke is on display. Together with William Hare he killed at least 16 people in 1828 and provided them for dissection. The museum also shows life and death masks from famous scientists, politicians and murderers.
